name: SmileButtons
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smile buttons
des:
Whether in good times or bad, when you can make someone smile, things always look better.

The great thing about smiles is that they don't always require a grand gesture. It's the little things that can count. Hold a door open for someone. Tell a funny joke.

That's what Smile Buttons is about. Behind each button that we share is something small: a video, an audio clip.

It's not grandiose, but we hope they'll put a smile on your face, and hopefully, inspire you to share them and put a smile on others. We hope you enjoy!

Website: https://smile-buttons.herokuapp.com/about

To learn more about my other skills, check out my website here:

https://alexa-skill-dev.gitlab.io/alexaWebsite/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
